translations: 多石子的；铺满卵石细砾的
（用卵石）铺（pebble 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: And quick to the white pebbled bottom it fell!
sentences.translation: 接着它飞快地回落到白色卵石的井底潺潺！

sentences.sentence: Striped deckchairs and bathing huts on pebbled Beer beach.
sentences.translation: 在比尔镇石滩上的条纹躺椅和洗澡小屋

sentences.sentence: Along each side of the stream, there were wide pebbled beaches.
sentences.translation: 溪两岸各有很宽的卵石滩。
